english.segment1: You look down from heaven. And melt me with your gaze. Then you come down from heaven. And wrap me in your wings
english.segment2: And it makes me feel loved again. So close in your arms. And it makes me feel home again. So close to your heart
english.segment3: So close to your heart, God. So close to your heart, God. So close to your heart. So close to your heart, God
english.segment5: So close to your heart, God. Hear I am, God
